## NumberFormatOptions interface

Extends `Intl.NumberFormat` options to include features brought by the [Unified API Proposal](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-unified-intl-numberformat)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NumberFormatOptions extends Intl.NumberFormatOptions 
```
